com.soa.message.handler.script
Interface MessageHandlerScriptVariables

public interface MessageHandlerScriptVariables

Lists the variables provided as context to message handler scripts.

Field Summary
static java.lang.String ALERT_REPORTER_VAR
          alerter - AlertReporter
static java.lang.String AUDIT_LOG_VAR
          auditLog - Logger that logs to the service's usage log (if auditing enabled).
static java.lang.String CONTEXT_VAR
          messageContext - MessageContext
static java.lang.String MSG_FACTORY_VAR
          msgFactory - MessageFactory
static java.lang.String SYSTEM_LOG_VAR
          systemLog - Logger that logs to the system's log file.
